nodes.text: An unidentified individual was the husband of Celly Organa, a noblewoman from the planet of Alderaan and a sister to Viceroy Bail Organa. He died at some point, making Celly a dowager.

Celly Organa's husband was only indirectly mentioned in The Force Unleashed Campaign Guide, which stated that Organa had started "a family of her own." Furthermore, Leia Organa's adopted aunt was referred to as a "dowager" in the 1995 novel Children of the Jedi. That word has two meanings: either a widow who holds a title or property derived from her deceased husband, or an elderly woman of high social station. Since The Force Unleashed Campaign Guide states that Celly Organa had a founded a family, the first meaning applies. According to Barbara Hambly, who authored Children of the Jedi, Celly Organa was single at the time of Leia's upbringing, "either through widowhood, possibly divorce, or her own choice."
